attributes.action: To stop nightclubs descriminating against people and refusing access for no reason other than they feel like it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nightclubs in this country regularly refuse access to ordinary people because they are "not regulars" or "not students".   
This is discrimination, imagine if they said "You'll need to try somewhere else your black, or your a woman".  This would not be accepted and I'm sure would be followed by police action, so why is it acceptable to refuse access on the basis of not being a student?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
